snippet: Victims of terrorism? More than a score of Iranian pilgrims have been caught up in the turmoil of Syria's increasingly militarized conflict. Iran, President Bashar al-Assad's firmest international ally, has denounced their kidnapping as inhumane and...
abstract: Victims of terrorism? More than a score of Iranian pilgrims have been caught up in the turmoil of Syria's increasingly militarized conflict. Iran, President Bashar al-Assad's firmest international ally, has denounced their kidnapping as inhumane and unjustifiable.

headline.main: What's Behind Iranian Abductions in Syria?
